short_description: Cluckmech Oasis, a top-down shooting Roguelike tower defense game. Play as the Warcluck and lead your team of animal heroes in a fight for survival. Collect, build and upgrade defenses, and engage in intense battle against waves of plant enemies.
detailed_description:
Welcome to the Animal Crusaders！

"Check, check, this is Warcluck speaking，Join us on this journey to save the world! Your feedback will help us make it even better."

Bilibili: @黑灯游戏 Heybox:@黑灯游戏 森空岛:@黑灯游戏

Discord: 


About the Game

  • Diverse Cluckmechs, endless combinations.

    Unleash your creativity with over 100 defensive structures and 300+ upgrade paths! Combine different towers and upgrades to create unique and powerful strategies. The possibilities are truly endless!

  • Enjoy fast-paced and addictive gameplay with a wide range of characters and abilities.

    From the firepower of the Warcluck to the trap-laying expertise of the Mouscle, each Character has unique skills and tactics. With endless replayability, build and upgrade your defenses, lead your troops, and defeat waves of enemies. Choose from a variety of unique heroes and discover new strategies with each playthrough.

  • Unleash your creativity then outsmart your enemies with clever strategies.

    Enjoy complete freedom to place your defenses and base anywhere on the map. Strategically plan your enemy's route and build your defenses accordingly.

  • Unpredictable adventures, full of wacky humor and unexpected twists.

    Embark on a journey filled with humor and wonder, explore unpredictable landscapes and encounter bizarre creatures. From deserts to glaciers, you'll never know what awaits you. Discover a wacky animal world and hidden surprises at every turn!

short_description: Crafted by a solo developer, VOIN is a first-person hack-and-slash. Cleave through hordes of enemies in fast-paced combat. Explore dark fantasy realms filled with secrets and dangers. Discover powerful gear and weapons, and face menacing bosses in your quest to cleanse a broken world.
detailed_description:
Just Updated

The skies flash with fury, and the world trembles. A storm is rising, and only the Thunderborn can stand against the abominations and spectral horrors summoned by HER will. Will you answer the call?

This is the first of several major updates, bringing long-planned additions to the game, and many of those that were shaped by your feedback.

New MASSIVE Dungeon Awaits

Descend into the abyss beneath the Cathedral of Veiled Lament. Explore breathtaking yet deadly vistas and face the guardian of Hadracon’s Scroll—Nomme, The Summoner of Tears.

New Enemies to Slay

The dead rise at HER call. HER will has stirred ancient titans of fire and ash. HER twisted craft have led to monstrous mutations, creatures grown beyond reason.

New HIGH-LEVEL Arena to Test Your Might

Deep in the dungeon lies the Circle of the Damned. Aid the ancient king Sedogor to purge the arena of filth and claim a weapon so powerful it tears through reality itself. Nothing shall stand between you and the cleansing.

And Much More:

  • New weapons and items

  • Rich chests with greater rewards

  • An optional boss with a unique reward

  • Gameplay improvements and fixes

The path to cleansing has only just begun. More challenges, expanded world activities, and even greater battles lie ahead.

A chilling horror is coming.


About the Game

In this shadowed world, secrets lie buried deep, and dangers wait in silence. Hordes rise against me, yet I cleave through them with elemental fury. I master the primal forces, bending chaos to my will. In this moment of convergence, I discover my true self, a being forged in both fury and beauty.

This is my dominion now.


I am the essence of ancient storms, summoned by a force beyond mortal comprehension. Born of the will of a faceless mage, I exist for one purpose alone: to become the weapon that reshapes a world ravaged by plague. My creators remain hidden, shrouded in mystery, yet I feel their command burn within me. This world is broken, and I am its reckoning. For I am VOIN.

Every strike I make is a hymn to destruction. My movements are a sacred dance within the heart of chaos. My blade sings as I sever through their ranks, executing perfect strikes, untouchable. I walk this path with purpose—will I remain unscathed?

The wind bends to my will. I leap across the ruins of once-grand castles with ease and soar above rivers raging far below. My fury rains down on them from the sky, leaving nothing but silence in my wake. I was never meant to crawl—I was born to be unbound and untethered.

I dive into the abyss, seeking the power that lies within. I claim weapons forged in the depths of darkness, gear that pulls me closer to my truest self. Yet this is only the beginning. I return to the Master’s Citadel, cleansing what I’ve gathered, sharpening the edge of my soul. And once more, I plunge back into the fray, unbroken, stronger than ever. This cycle defines me—the unyielding, ever-reborn.

They stand before me—titans of flesh and fury, living monuments to annihilation. Their eyes gleam with malice, their tactics ruthless. They believe they will break me. But I face them without fear. For I am no mere mortal standing in their shadow—I am the force destined to shatter their dominion. I walk among gods and monsters, and I do not tremble.

short_description: Quickclaw is a 2d action/platform fully handmade with sprite animations. Take on the role of Dynamo City's newest vigilante Quickclaw in her fight against organized crime with an original storyline and many new characters in order to give the experience to play into an animated series from the 90s!
detailed_description:
Take on the role of Dynamo City's newest vigilante Quickclaw in her fight against organized crime!



Dynamo city has been attacked by a dangerous alien race.





Luckily the heroes of earth intervened and eliminated the threat.







With the city in chaos many new super-villains took control of several neighborhoods.







With the bigger heroes engaged in global threats, only the new vigilante Quickclaw can save the day!



Rid the neighborhoods of crime and raise your reputation as a new vigilante.



Use quickclaw's feline abilities such as super jumps, speed and super-strength to fight and move quickly across the city's rooftops.



Face increasingly greater threats as the story progresses!




Updates:
Quickclaw will get new traversal, fight moves, new graphics, comic book pages, story levels, enemies, bosses, costumes and skills.

short_description: Here is a witch who wants nothing but to marry you. She decides to seek potions from a certain Succubus in order to charm you... but a labyrinthine forest filled with devils stands in her way. Will she be able to find the potions, and with them, her happy ending?
detailed_description:
Wedding Witch is a rogue-like game that involves exploring randomly generated maps, fighting against hordes of devils, and finding the Succubus's potions.

The Succubus's potions are hidden somewhere in a dark forest filled with devils. Solve various tasks in order to find the potions!



Drinking the Succubus's potions will make the witch's body transform. What kind of witch do you desire?



The witch gains access to new spells whenever she drinks the Succubus's potions. Create your own spell combinations!

Magical flowers containing mysterious energies bloom in the labyrinthine forest. Add them to your bouquet and gain new powers!



Find the Succubus's potions, escape the forest, and earn your happy ending!

short_description: This is a text-based adventure puzzle game, where you must struggle to survive in a world filled with ghosts and urban legends. While collecting clues, you'll uncover the truth behind the world and find the way out. The game features a wealth of levels, unconventional rules, and a touch of horror.
detailed_description:
Follow us

Join the community on our !


About the Game

Gameplay

Explore the world by clicking on nodes, and interact with the world using items to solve puzzles. Understand the behavior of ghosts and urban legends by reading the rules, analyzing their weaknesses, and finding a way to survive through the correct actions. Live through a world filled with dangers and crises.
Store your progress until you find the most hidden truth of the story.

Story

Due to extreme emotions, deep obsessions, and stories passed from mouth to mouth, urban legends were born. They are ghosts that weave through tall buildings, turning the places they inhabit into haunted realms. When you accidentally become ensnared in their world, all you can rely on are those cold, unfeeling rules. As you become more and more entrenched, surrounded by danger, you may suddenly wonder: Who wrote these rules? Why are they full of contradictions? Can they truly help you survive in this bizarre world of ghostly tales?

Features

  • Engaging node interactions and puzzle-solving.
  • Complex rules; be cautious and mindful of your every action.
  • Interested item mechanics and ghosts behavior.
  • Save and load feature for both standard and customizable levels.
  • Customizable levels, create your own rules and ghostly tales.

Custom Level Tutorial

Free Content Updates

This game will continue to receive free updates with more levels in the future.

Please check our other game!

short_description: A fast-paced shooter with simple controls. Enhance your character by purchasing cards and hold the line against waves of hostile mechs as an employee of a private military company.
detailed_description:
[Game Overview]
Play as Snezhinka, a fixed-term contract employee at a private military company, and hold the line against waves of hostile mechs in a 2.5D dystopian world. In order to survive against increasingly powerful enemies, you’ll need to use what remains of your meager salary after taxes and other expenses are deducted to purchase cards and develop your combat capabilities.

This fast-paced shooting game can be enjoyed with a controller or a mouse and keyboard. The controls are simple: you’ll only need to move, aim, shoot, and use gadgets.

In addition to a robust story mode, this game also features two challenge modes—complete with online rankings—and a collection in which you can rewatch cutscenes and peruse information on the game’s characters and weapons.

[Story]
Snezhinka’s older sister is a member of the elite Molten Iron Squadron. One day, Snezhinka abruptly loses contact with her sister, prompting her to join the private military company Blue Peacock Co. and head for the front lines of the war in order to bring her sister home.

short_description: Collect your favorite characters, nurture them, and have fun just watching in this hololive fan game! It's a 2D tower defense game that offers depth for dedicated players, strategic elements, and easy enjoyment for casual players.
detailed_description:
☆Over 100,000 downloads in the first month! Ranked 2nd in sales on Steam Japan!☆

A lively parade with hololive VTubers and mascot characters!


"HoloParade" is a fan game of hololive and the first title to serve as a test case for "holo Indie". Collect, nurture, and enjoy watching your favorite characters! It's a 2D tower defense game that offers depth, strategy, and can also be enjoyed casually.

To hololive fans:
This game is designed for players who enjoy strategy and trial and error, and involves exploring various formations and play styles suited to each stage. With stages featuring a variety of characteristics and characters having their specific strengths and weaknesses, please note that you cannot easily clear all stages with just your favorite characters. With careful character development and strategic gameplay, you can clear stages up to the end credits with a favorite formation, but subsequent high-difficulty stages will require formations tailored to the enemies.

Feature 1: Simple Yet Deep, Lively Battles

The basic system is a classic 2D tower defense game where you summon characters from your base and march them forward to destroy the enemy's base to win. While the controls are simple, the gameplay is profoundly deep. With over 65 characters, each possessing a variety of abilities like ally healing support and self-destruct attacks, skillful combination and flexible formation are key to enjoying the game.

Additionally, there's an element inspired by parades called the 'Symphony Effect,' where various effects are activated based on the musical instruments played by the characters in march. This adds further strategic depth to the formation of your parade squad and the order of their summoning.

Feature 2: Comprehensive Development Elements

In addition to leveling up and limit breaking, there is a 'Skill' system that allows you to add special abilities not available through regular development. Since you can add up to three types of skills to each character and select them carefully, you can enjoy a unique development process! Furthermore, since you can reset levels and get a full refund of the coins spent, it allows for more freedom in restructuring formations and character development.

Feature 3: No Gacha Purchases, No Stamina System

The scout gacha, which allows you to acquire characters, can be used by consuming tickets obtained within the game, with no additional purchases required. Also, as there is no stamina system, you are not bound by time and can play as much as you like, whenever you like.

Moreover, the scout gacha allows you to choose from two randomly selected character candidates, enabling players to make selections based on their strategy or preference rather than leaving it entirely to chance.

Feature 4: Take a Break with Various Talents and Mini-Games in the Office

When you return to the office, the home screen, you'll be greeted by newly recorded voice lines from Harusaki Nodoka, a staff member of hololive. In the office, talents from hololive may also make appearances, and you might witness some unexpected interactions.


Additionally, mini-games with gameplay entirely different from the main story have been implemented. These games allow you to collect coins necessary for character strengthening. For now, the mini-games titled "Hurry Up! Miko-Chi!" and "Dancing Subaru" are available. In "Hurry Up! Miko-Chi!", Sakura Miko (a VTuber affiliated with Hololive), who has overslept, dashes at full speed towards her destination while avoiding obstacles.



This game is published under CCMC Corp(※1)'s Indie game brand "holo Indie".(※2)
This game is allowed to be monetized under the examination and terms of "holo Indie".
Please note that any monetized derivative work games that include Cover Corp.'s content outside of holo Indie is not covered by these terms and is not allowed.

※1. About CCMC Corp.
CCMC Corp. is entrusted with website management (ex: steam) including, examination, publishing and other necessary tasks by Cover Corp.

※2. About "holo Indie"
holo Indie's objective is to cooperate with hololive production fans and creators.
It is a game brand that offers "Game Creator Support Program" for the derivative work games.
For more details about "holo Indie", Please refer to the Cover Corp.'s "Derivative work guidelines".

short_description: Twelve years after Senior Inspector Jeon Gyeong's retirement, she is visited by a young police officer: a woman who pleads with her to reexamine Seowon's case. But with each uncovered memory, only one thing becomes clear: everyone in Seowon's vicinity was lying.
detailed_description:
"I remember how surprised I was when I first saw this case. Everyone involved was lying, for one reason or another."

#No_Case_Should_Remain_Unsolved is a detective game where players uncover and piece together memory fragments to solve a long-forgotten case. Follow former police detective Jeon Gyeong as she acquires clues and testimony relating to the case of a missing girl.

#No_Case_Should_Remain_Unsolved

February 5, 2012. A little girl named Seowon is reported missing from a playground. Police launch an investigation and question witnesses and suspects, but Seowon's case is never solved.
Twelve years after Senior Inspector Jeon Gyeong's retirement, she is visited by a young police officer: a woman who pleads with her to reexamine Seowon's case.
But with each uncovered memory, only one thing becomes clear: everyone in Seowon's vicinity was lying.

Features

  • Experience an imaginative reasoning system where players connect memories like pieces of a jigsaw puzzle.
  • Uncover passcodes, keys, 54 conversations, and two hidden truths.
  • Over the course of a 2-3 hour playthrough, players will learn why Seowon's disappearance is the only case Jeon Gyeong has left unsolved.
  • Also featuring an original soundtrack by Seongyi Yi, composer of Legal Dungeon and The Wake!

short_description: Redacted:Genome is a survival action horror game where the player is given the ability to swap between various arm powers and rifle barrels to fight off enemy mimics in the third or first person. Craft ammo, food, and upgrade your abilities for the greatest chance at survival.
detailed_description:
In the near future, a mysterious and advanced district, codenamed "Genesis," becomes the epicenter of a covert genetic experiment gone awry. Players take on the role of Levi, a skilled special operations soldier, assigned to uncover the truth behind the chaos that has engulfed Genesis. The H.O.P.E. (Hostile Opposition Prevention and Elimination) team, tasked with maintaining order and ensuring the success of the experiment, has gone dark, and Levi is sent in to investigate the growing threat. As Levi navigates the desolate streets of Genesis, he discovers a city in the grip of an insidious mutation. The once-thriving metropolis now teems with grotesque creatures, mutated by an unknown
force that has corrupted the very genetic fabric of the district. Levi's mission is to piece together the events leading to this catastrophe, unveil the truth behind the redacted genome experiments, and neutralize the mutated threats that now roam freely. Redacted Genome combines intense third-person or first-person action with an immersive narrative, challenging players to adapt their strategies as they face ever-evolving mutations. Levi, equipped with advanced military gear and cutting-edge weaponry, must use his combat prowess and intelligence to survive encounters with the mutated horrors and uncover the secrets hidden within the city. Throughout the game, Levi will encounter remnants of the H.O.P.E. team, discovering audio logs and scattered documents that gradually reveal the scope of the genetic experiment. As the story unfolds, Levi must make critical decisions that impact the fate of Genesis and the people involved in the ill-fated project. Redacted Genome's atmospheric and haunting soundtrack sets the tone for the unraveling mystery, creating a sense of tension and urgency. The game's visuals showcase the contrast between the once gleaming utopia of Genesis and the nightmarish reality that has taken its place.

short_description: Your next chapter takes flight! Immerse yourself in the enchanting world of Quidditch by playing solo or sharing the magic with friends and family.
detailed_description:
Your next chapter takes flight! Immerse yourself in the enchanting world of Quidditch by playing solo or sharing the magic with friends and family. Plus, keep your Gringotts vault closed because there are no microtransactions!

THE DELUXE EDITION INCLUDES:

  • Gryffindor House Pack
  • Hufflepuff House Pack
  • Slytherin House Pack
  • Ravenclaw House Pack
  • 2,000 Gold

LIVE YOUR QUIDDITCH FANTASY

Take to the sky as one of the classic positions—Chaser, Seeker, Keeper, or Beater—each with their own unique play style. Soar into legendary Quidditch arenas, as well as maps that showcase never-before-seen areas of the wizarding world.

MULTIPLE WAYS TO PLAY

Career Mode: From backyard battles in the Weasley Burrow to high-stakes showdowns at the Quidditch World Cup, rise to become a champion either solo or in online co-op with teams of up to 3 friends.
  • Exhibition Matches: set your teams, map, and difficulty and play alone or on teams of up to 3 in online co-op.
  • Player vs Player: Test your skills in competitive online matches against other Quidditch teams.

YOUR QUIDDITCH YOUR WAY

Customize Your Approach: Level up and use skill points to tailor your play style for each role. Change your flight style by switching between and leveling up different brooms.
Play As Yourself or as Iconic Harry Potter Characters: cosmetic customization options and classic character designs allow you to express your game-time personality.

short_description: Jogo estilo survivors com COOP ONLINE (1-4 jogadores). Enfrente hordas com amigos magos. Objetivos em equipe, atualizações e sinergias de feitiços poderosas. Inferno de balas com fogo amigo: ninguém está a salvo! Ação frenética estilo roguelite.
detailed_description:
Roadmap


Sobre o jogo

The Spell Brigade é um jogo estilo survivors cooperativo online para 1-4 jogadores. Junte-se aos seus amigos magos para derrotar hordas de criaturas das trevas. Complete objetivos em equipe, desbloqueie novas atualizações e crie sinergias de feitiços superpoderosas. Nem amigo nem inimigo está a salvo neste inferno de balas com fogo amigo!

COOPERATIVO 1-4 JOGADORES

The Spell Brigade combina a jogabilidade estilo survivors que você ama com a loucura multiplayer de sempre. Lutem juntos contra milhares de monstros estranhos. Completem objetivos aleatórios em equipe e atualizem feitiços juntos. Sobrevivam juntos!

PARAÍSO/INFERNO DE BALAS COM FOGO AMIGO

Enfrentar exércitos inteiros é arriscado, mesmo com seus amigos ao seu lado! Lutar em equipe tem muitas vantagens, mas inevitavelmente vocês vão atrapalhar uns aos outros. Mas não tema! Você pode usar suas mortes a seu favor e usar tokens de Reviver para (literalmente) explodir você e seus colegas de equipe de volta à ação!

DOMINE OS SEUS FEITIÇOS

Melhore, aumente e infunda seus feitiços com diferentes tipos de elementos e atualizações. Combine isso com seus Encantamentos, Missões, Relíquias e a quantidade de magos em seu esquadrão, e o potencial para o caos puro e desenfreado é infinito!

JUNTE-SE AO NOSSO DISCORD

Se você tem bugs para relatar ou feedback para compartilhar, quer verificar a equipe de desenvolvimento ou apenas conversar sobre magos, você pode fazer tudo isso e mais em nosso incrível Discord! Também postamos conteúdo de desenvolvimento pelo menos duas vezes por semana, então o que você está esperando?!

short_description: Crime Boss: Rockay City is a 1-4 player co-op FPS heist game with enjoyable stealth and epic killing spree combat. Featuring a solo roguelike campaign that combines FPS and strategy elements with the most hilariously cheesy voice acting that make you laugh.
detailed_description:
CONTENT ROADMAP


About the Game

Rockay City is still alive and kicking – with new content being added throughout 2025! New adventures await, buddy.

Choose from a range of heists & robberies and rise to the top of the criminal underworld! Only then can you become the Crime Boss of Rockay City!

Play Co-operatively with friends.

Bring your friends across 4 player co-operative multiplayer heists and make the big bucks.

Choose your difficulty, create your boss, equip your weapons and perks and play missions alone, with bots or with your friends. Take on single missions or complete co-op mini-camapigns in the story-driven Urban Legends mode or randomise your missions with Shuffle mode. Add some variety by fighting off hordes of enemies in the Rockay Rumble mode.

Build up your stash of cash, hire new characters, purchase new weapons or upgrade your perks to increase your chances of taking all the loot.

Play with your friends across all supported platforms with cross platform multiplayer and maximise your chances of success with your friends.

Earn rewards on top of cash.

Earn XP in a universal progression system across both single-player and co-operative game modes!

Each level up allows players unlock new weapons, heisters, equipment and skins. Kit yourself for success by customising your loadouts and crew.

Keep an eye out for our double XP events to climb the ladder even faster.

Operate Solo in the Single-player Campaign!

Experienced players can take control of Travis Baker and win all the turf in Rockay City in a roguelite single-player campaign.

Build and manage your own crew of criminals and overthrow the current gang leaders in the city. Earn cash from completing missions, level up your heisters and gain permanent unlocks when you die to help you get closer to your ultimate goal in the next run.

With dozens of missions to choose from in the campaign, each randomised at the start of each run, you can make a name for yourself through petit thievery or grand, over the top heists.

short_description: Become a martial arts master in this survivor-like roguelite inspired by action movies of the ‘80s. Use your fists, feet, and the environment to fight off relentless thugs. Master powerful combos, enhance your skills, and remember: everything around you is a weapon!
detailed_description:
Step into the shoes of a martial arts master in a thrilling survivor-like roguelite inspired by action movies of the ‘80s. Use the environment and improvised weapons, master new techniques, and create devastating combos to fight off relentless goons and bandits! Karate Survivor delivers intense, fast-paced combat where improvisation and creativity are key to surviving the streets.

Key Features

  • Improvised Combat. Use whatever you can get your hands on to defeat your enemies. From plastic flamingos to mop handles, even a child's toy hammer can be deadly in the right hands.

  • Environmental Warfare. Manipulate your surroundings to your advantage. Push objects at enemies, bring down scaffolding, or slam them with a microwave door.

  • Dynamic Combos. Dozens of different attacks allow you to create unique combinations of up to six attacks, tailored to your fighting style. Experiment and discover the most effective combos.

  • Progression and Mastery. Collect experience to unlock and master new permanent techniques and skills between runs, making each playthrough more rewarding.

  • Diverse Locations and Boss Battles. Battle through various areas, each with its own distinct features and items for combat. Face powerful bosses in each location, testing your skills to the limit.

  • Fast-Paced Runs. Immerse yourself in rapid, intense street battles. Test your martial arts skills and survival instincts in action-packed showdowns that pay homage to the adrenaline-fueled scenes of action movies, ensuring you're always on the edge of your seat.

Fight fast, precisely, and without remorse.

short_description: Nathan Kennedy a U.S. Military Advanced Futuristic Cyborg must race against time to complete sophisticated U.S. Military Super Soldier courses in Nevada as part of The Pentagon's Project-X, A Project Being Monitored And Pending Full Approval by the White House.
detailed_description:
Name: Advanced Killer Cyborg, Engine: Unreal Engine 4, Development Time: 1 Year ( 2024 ).

Nathan Kennedy (34) a U.S. Army Corporal critically injured during a U.S. Special Operation in Afghanistan has been operated and turned into a Cyborg by The Pentagon in a New Cyborg Super Soldier Project Partially authorized by The White House called Project-X, which aims to turn disabled U.S. soldiers into Cyborgs possessing increased physical strength, jump height and movement speed than the average U.S. soldier having abilities like wall running, double jump, dash and high gun precision. Nathan Kennedy( YOU ) are one of the disabled soldiers selected by The Pentagon to undergo the procedure. You have completed your transformation and must prove to your GENERALS that you can complete a military course built in the Nevada Desert which will then prove to The White House that the enhancements are a success and that Project-X can be fully authorized to go into full-scale adoptation by the U.S. Military turning more Disable Soldiers into Strong Powerful Cyborgs that will give the U.S. an edge over RUSSIA, CHINA, IRAN, NORTH KOREA in Military operations. That these Cyborgs are strong, powerful and can be reinstated back in the army to serve along side other members being much faster and stronger than their counterparts.

GAMEPLAY: U.S. Army Corporal Kennedy in the courses has access to a range of U.S. Army rifles: SCAR-H, M4 Carbine, MP5, P90 and AUG, He is allowed to customize them with different attachments: Extended magazine, Drum magazine, Reflex sight, OKP sight, Kobra sight, Holographic sight etc. Courses can be replayed with different loadouts, Courses can be individually selected and replayed after completion.

The Courses present different challenges per course, including shooting range targets to take out, rooms where wall running is necessary in order to make it to the other side, having to crawl through an airvent network, courses with verticality meaning multiple accessible floors, swimming through underground tunnels etc, Courses can be outdoor only/ indoor only or be both depending on which set of challenges they present. Each course is designed to present a unique set of challenges that only a Cybernetic Mechanichanized Advanced Soldier can navigate.

short_description: Escape the zombie infected zone, using an arsenal of weapons, in this arena shooter game.
detailed_description:
Escape the zombie infected zone, using an arsenal of weapons, in this arena shooter game.

Due to a malfunction you crash landed.

And now you are stuck behind an apocalyptic infection zone, crawling with zombies.

The headquarter will provide directions on how to escape this danger zone, so stay on your toes

Fight your way through the endless horde of the living dead.

You will have an arsenal of weapons you will find in the post apocalyptic region.

Fight your way to the safe zone, if you can.

Gameplay features arena shooter weapon system, Go and Gib!!

short_description: Explore colonial Brazil on a unique off-road experience along the Estrada Real. You will be the Pilot transported to a time when the roads were traveled by muleteers and explorers, full of mysteries, gold and surprising encounters with historical figures from Minas Gerais.
detailed_description:
In Moxter, you’ll be transported back in time to ride the trails of the Royal Road with high-powered motorcycles, UTVs, and ATVs. Travel through paths where the future meets the past, set in the colonial era of Minas Gerais under Portuguese rule. It was a time when slavery in the gold mines was a harsh reality, all work was done by hand, and goods were carried by muleteers and their pack animals. Embark on this epic journey, uncover the history of Minas Gerais through the milestones of the Royal Road scattered along the trails, and meet the local people — humble and welcoming. As you explore the historic towns with their simple Minas Baroque style, you’ll experience a story filled with history and emotion that only Moxter – Royal Road can deliver.

Characters

  • Xico Ravier – Brazil's most famous medium, but here he uses his "spiritual antenna" to find the best paths on the trails. If a rock rolls onto your path, he saw it coming! A symbol of charity and spirituality, he brings good vibes — even in the mud.

  • Tiradentes Ranca Toco – Leader of the Minas Gerais independence movement, but off-road, he’s the master at "unblocking" trails. A fighter for independence and the first to free the road — and the last to back down from a giant pothole. A true hero of freedom… and winching!

  • Padre Frei Coimbra – A figure so important, not even muddy trails can divert him from his mission. When the climb looks impossible, he prays and revs up! A builder of faith and society in Minas, and possibly, a pro with off-road tips.

  • Kobreocheque (JK) – Born in Diamantina, JK not only built Brasília but also blazes shortcuts on the trails. His modern vision includes turbocharging a mule, and of course, a broad smile while facing Minas Gerais’ muddy terrain.

  • Xico Roia Rei – He started in the gold mines but now leads on the trails! Xico Roia Rei is a symbol of resilience, teaching you how to conquer freedom — and dodge water pits like a true king of Ouro Preto!

  • Hirda Furachão – Strong, fearless, and always in high gear, Hilda takes on every sharp turn with confidence. She defied society's rules and now defies the rocks on the path with a smile and her foot on the throttle.

  • Dumorro – The "father of aviation," but also the aerial stunt king of off-road! He didn’t just take flight with a plane; on the trails, he "soars" on his bike. Dumorro, a pioneer of aviation — and controlled slides!

  • Aleijadinho – A master of Baroque art and trails, Aleijadinho carved his legacy into the hills of Minas. Think it’s tough navigating these trails? Imagine creating art at the same time. A genius of Baroque… and mud-covered wheels.

  • Pedro Álvares do Grau – The discoverer of Brazil, but also of hidden trails. With his name carved on mountaintops, he made history, and now he races downhill with courage and adrenaline on the trails.

  • Xica da Trilhas – Xica da Silva broke social norms and now takes on rocks and potholes just as boldly. A major figure in Minas Gerais' history, her presence is so commanding that even the mules stop and stare when she passes by!

Adventures and Connection to the Past

The journey in Moxter reflects not just the challenge of the trails but also a return to simplicity and genuine adventure. The freedom of riding motorcycles, UTVs, and ATVs through the rugged terrain of Minas Gerais’ mountains evokes the adventurous spirit of muleteers and explorers who tackled obstacles without modern suspension comforts.

The game recreates the feeling of a "journey through the past," where every turn reveals a new story. While the world advances in technology, Moxter takes you back to a simpler era, where happiness was found in life’s small moments.

Game Features

  • Immersive Environment: Realistic settings inspired by the geography and architecture of the Royal Road, capturing the essence of colonial Minas Gerais, Brazil.

  • Challenging Gameplay: Ride motorcycles and UTVs across rough terrain, facing diverse weather conditions and natural obstacles for an authentic off-road thrill.

  • Historical Interaction: Encounters with historical characters transport players to pivotal moments in Brazilian history.

  • Exploration and Freedom: Choose your own trails and experience unique adventures along the Royal Road, interacting with local culture and uncovering the living history of the region.

Final Surprise

The game also offers a hidden experience where players can find pieces of the iconic 14-Bis. Assemble and fly this historic machine, adding a special touch to your adventure. Moxter invites players to reflect on the changes brought by progress while reconnecting with nature and the thrill of a time when the open road was life’s ultimate adventure.
